import React, { useState } from 'react' const AddReview = () => { const customStyle = { paddingLeft: 10, paddingBottom: 5, paddingTop: 5, } const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [rating, setRating] = useState(""); const [reviewText, setReviewText] = useState(""); return (
{setName(e.target.value)}} type="text" className="form-control m-2" id="name">
) } export default AddReview
